content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #283

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 77

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Providing FHIR Resources to a CDS Service
Section: Prefetch Template
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

Valid prefetch URLs should only contain:

Comment:
The recommended search parameters do not allow "_include". This seems it would reduce the value of prefetched searches on MedicationOrder since at least one major EHR seems to use a medicationReference to refer to the med being ordered. Is there a way to handle this in prefetch, or does this use case always require the Hook to do follow-on requests?

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #283

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 77

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Providing FHIR Resources to a CDS Service
Section: Prefetch Template
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

Valid prefetch URLs should only contain:

Comment:
The recommended search parameters do not allow "_include". This seems it would reduce the value of prefetched searches on MedicationOrder since at least one major EHR seems to use a medicationReference to refer to the med being ordered. Is there a way to handle this in prefetch, or does this use case always require the Hook to do follow-on requests?

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #283

Proposed Disposition: Considered - question answered
Proposed Disposition Comment:
The language in the specification merely recommends the following prefetch template restrictions. Implementers are free to support additional functionality if desired.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #283

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Considered - question answered
Disposition Comment:
The language in the specification merely recommends the following prefetch template restrictions. Implementers are free to support additional functionality if desired.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

brettmarquard commented on Issue #283

Closed per CDS Hooks block vote Wednesday, 5/30/2018
